name: BIGGEST BIRD THE GAME
description:
THE BIGGEST BIRD SONG BELONGS TO SAINT MERCIRAT∅R

THE BACKGROUND IMAGE USED FOR THE GAME WAS A LOW RES STOCK IMAGE TAKEN OFF OF GOOGLE

TERENCE OBVIOUSLY BELONGS TO ROVIO

This is an old game I made to test out haxeflixel. This was made back when "I'm the biggest bird" was a thing. Decided to release the project today. This is a simple little platformer, your goal is to reach the castle. Have fun!

If you want, you can check out my WIP game "Coolguy Simulator" (it is very cool😎)
